newsitem.title: USA: Diablo Canyon nuke seen down for days, not weeks.
newsitem.headline: Diablo Canyon nuke seen down for days, not weeks.

text.p: Pacific Gas and Electric Co's 1,073 megawatt (MW) Diablo Canyon unit 2 will be down "for days but not weeks" after going off-line Saturday when a feedwater pump line malfunctioned, a company spokesman said Tuesday.
"Every time a unit goes down like this you have a laundry list of things you want to look at," he noted.
As a result, additional maintenance work is being conducted on the unit, but an exact time schedule for its restart was not given.
PG&E will reassess the unit's status on Wednesday, the spokesman said.
